| The Water Mage:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can [follow](/wiki/Follower "Follower") you to other levels.
* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* wants your [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact").
* hits creatures as a +4 weapon. |                                                                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                                                                               |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line5088](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line5088 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c")                                                              |

The **Water Mage** is the [Flame mage](/wiki/Flame_mage "Flame mage") [quest nemesis](/wiki/Quest_nemesis "Quest nemesis"). Do not underestimate him; he is a high-level spellcaster. His base AC -10, the same as [Master Kaen](/wiki/Master_Kaen "Master Kaen")'s. He is identical to the [Earth Mage](/wiki/Earth_Mage "Earth Mage") (the [Ice mage](/wiki/Ice_mage "Ice mage") quest nemesis).

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Water_Mage\&action=edit)*
html:
Water Mage

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ Water Mage
Difficulty 34
Attacks Spell-casting, Spell-casting, Weapon 1d6, Claw 1d4 amulet-stealing
@ Water Mage
Difficulty 34
Attacks

Spell-casting, Spell-casting, Weapon 1d6, Claw 1d4 amulet-stealing

Base level 25
Base experience 1060
Speed 10
Base AC -10
Base MR 10
Alignment 20 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances death magic, poison
Resistances conveyed poison (100%)

The Water Mage:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • wants your quest artifact.
  • hits creatures as a +4 weapon.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line5088

The Water Mage is the Flame mage quest nemesis. Do not underestimate him; he is a high-level spellcaster. His base AC -10, the same as Master Kaen's. He is identical to the Earth Mage (the Ice mage quest nemesis).

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Water_Mage&oldid=131394"

The '''Water Mage''' is the [[Flame mage]] [[quest nemesis]].  Do not underestimate him; he is a high-level spellcaster.  His base AC -10, the same as [[Master Kaen]]'s. He is identical to the [[Earth Mage]] (the [[Ice mage]] quest nemesis).
